name: Gunny Games
description:
Play bowling, kayaking, or volleyball using your Android phone as a motion controller. This game is pretty similar to Wii Sports Resort, with a couple modifications. Games allows split-screen multiplayer with 1-4 players.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS - PLEASE READ!!!!!!

To play this game, you need a PC and at least one Android phone/tablet with a Gyroscope and accelerometer per player. This game uses your phone to, for example, figure out how you're swinging you arm so it isn't optional. You'll also need to download the GunnyGamesRemote app from the Google Play Store (or down below).
